@berdanka
It's true. Lately there is too much recycling when it comes to hentai, however in the case of the vanilla genre, it is just boring, in the case of the NTR it is just bad writing and laziness. I'm only supposed to be here for the sex, but if you're going to give me hundreds of pages with dialogue blocks, it means that the author wants to tell something, a story, but I always find the same recycled situations and the same nonsensical justifications . So what is the point? I don't think people here need 100 pages to jerk off.
